articles.title: Nvidia Is Trying To Stop Crypto Miners Buying RTX 3000 Series Cards - Kotaku
articles.description: Earlier this year, Nvidia announced that their GeForce RTX 3060 graphics cards would ship with a “reduced Ethereum hash rate”, making them a lot less useful for crypto miners. They’re now extending that move to the RTX 3080, RTX 3070 and RTX 3060 Ti as well.
